biotools.summary:
IMGT/LocusView is the IMGT® tool providing a view of immunoglobulin (IG), T cell receptor (TR) and major histocompatibility (MH) loci.
Display is based on the IMGT-ONTOLOGY concepts.

bioschemas.name: IMGT LocusView
